title: I am unable to transfer servers.
body:
I am in the army and i am going on a tdy overseas for a month or two. After the duty day is done i would like to play some norms and not lag out. Also it'd be cool to see how people play over in my new location :)
The server transfer things no longer appear in the shop thingy for me? Anyone else having this problem what do I do? Is it because of the preseason?? Lemme know

replies.body:
Are you using the Alpha/Beta client or the Legacy client? Transfers aren't in the new client, but if you switch back to the legacy real quick, you should see the option listed there.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this helped!
